name: Psycho Bunny, Why You Shoot Me?
name_original: Psycho Bunny, Why You Shoot Me?
description:
Psycho Bunny, Why You Shoot Me? is a local two-player competitive game where the aim is to shoot the other Psycho Bunny using ammo collected from the field. Each player has 3 lives (not displayed). The game ends when one player is out of lives. Made during Nordic Game Jam 2015 by Martin Hasseldam, Lavinia Brailescu, Amarya Kramer, Remy Stuurwold

Controls (XInput gamepads recommended):

Press P to start game.

Press Escape to quit.

Keyboard:

Player 1:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Shoot

Player 2:

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Enter - Shoot

Gamepad:

  • D-Pad - Move
  • Right Stick - Aim
  • Right Shoulder - Shoot
